title: Why A Young Minneapolis Man Wanted To Join ISIS
teaser: There has been a development in a story we heard on the program last week. An 18-year-old Minnesota man named Abdullahi Yusuf is at the center of an experiment in deradicalization in this country. He entered a guilty plea today which clears the way for him to take next steps in his counseling program.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
